mapper.insert: insert into goodsSystem.user_role(user_Id, role_Id, create_Time, update_Time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{roleId},#{createTime},#{updateTime});
mapper.update: update goodsSystem.user_role set role_Id=#{roleId} and update_Time=#{updateTime} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select id, user_Id, role_Id, create_Time, update_Time from goodsSystem.user_role where id=#{id};
select id, user_Id, role_Id, create_Time, update_Time from goodsSystem.user_role where user_Id=#{userId};

select P.id,P.url,P.create_Time,P.update_Time from goodssystem.power P join ( select RP.power_Id as id from goodssystem.role_power RP join ( select R.id as id from goodssystem.role R join goodssystem.user_role UR on UR.user_Id=#{id} and UR.role_Id=R.id )URR on URR.id=RP.role_Id ) URRP on URRP.id=P.id
